First Question: What is the ASCII plaintext corresponding to this binary string? 
010110100110010101110010011011110111001100100000001001100010000001001111011011100110010101110011

Second Question: What is the ASCII plaintext corresponding to this hex string? 
4f6820776f77777721204261736520313020697320636f6f6c20616e6420616c6c2062757420486578787878

Third Question: What is the ASCII plaintext corresponding to this octal string?
(HINT: octal -> int -> hex -> chars) 
535451006154133420162312701623127154533472040334725553046256234620151334201413347444030460563312201673122016730267164
57652063616E20726570726573656E74206E756D6265727320696E20616E7920626173652077652077616E74

Fourth Question: What is the ACII representation of this integer? 
(HINT: int -> hex -> chars)
8889185069805239596091046045687553579520816794635237831028832039457
54686973206973206F6E652062696720276F6C20696E746567657221



python3 -c 'print("\x5a\x65\x72\x6f\x73\x20\x26\x20\x4f\x6e\x65\x73\x0a\x4f\x68\x20\x77\x6f\x77\x77\x77\x21\x20\x42\x61\x73\x65\x20\x31\x30\x20\x69\x73\x20\x63\x6f\x6f\x6c\x20\x61\x6e\x64\x20\x61\x6c\x6c\x20\x62\x75\x74\x20\x48\x65\x78\x78\x78\x78")' | nc challenge.nahamcon.com 31958

payload1 = "\x5a\x65\x72\x6f\x73\x20\x26\x20\x4f\x6e\x65\x73"
payload2 = "\x4f\x68\x20\x77\x6f\x77\x77\x77\x21\x20\x42\x61\x73\x65\x20\x31\x30\x20\x69\x73\x20\x63\x6f\x6f\x6c\x20\x61\x6e\x64\x20\x61\x6c\x6c\x20\x62\x75\x74\x20\x48\x65\x78\x78\x78\x78"
payload3 = "\x57\x65\x20\x63\x61\x6E\x20\x72\x65\x70\x72\x65\x73\x65\x6E\x74\x20\x6E\x75\x6D\x62\x65\x72\x73\x20\x69\x6E\x20\x61\x6E\x79\x20\x62\x61\x73\x65\x20\x77\x65\x20\x77\x61\x6E\x74"
